text: "Runaways" is a 2012 song by alternative rock band The Killers and is the leading single from their fourth studio album Battle Born. It went to number 78 in the United States, number 18 in the United Kingdom, number 13 in Scotland and Ireland, number 67 in Australia, number 37 in Japan and Canada, number 53 in Italy, number 64 in the Netherlands and number 67 in Australia. == References == Category:2012 songs Category:The Killers songs Category:Heartland rock songs
title: Runaways (The Killers song)
